dimensions: H x diam.: 9 x 12 cm (3 9/16 x 4 3/4 in.)
title: Bottle and cover
description: Globe-shaped, supported by circular frame with pendant swags, acorn finial, tall knopped stem on stepped circular base; globe cover opens by pressure to finial, revealing 2 glass bottles (for pounce and ink) and 2 slots (for pen and penknife).
name: Bottle and cover
